Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
When I look at a beach parasol table, I always
think of summer.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
Are there any fish here?

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
I love cobblestone roads. Something about the
way the stones all fit together just fascinates
me.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
This is really something... Look how shiny it is.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
Sweet! I love archaeology!

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
Amazing. It looks just like a real chicken.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
You're using a watering pot as a vase, huh? Very
old school. I like it.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
I like this fence. It's got a very old-world look to
it.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
What is this? ...Oh, it's a guardrail, huh?

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
I'd rather use stones than bricks, but it totally
depends on the person.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
That's certainly a vivid red. Anything in that
shade is sure to stand out.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
Ah, I like the color white. Whenever I see it, I feel
like it's washing down my heart.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
These decorations... I've never seen anything
quite like them before. They look nice, they really
do.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
Hee hee, this decor is so stylish!

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
There's nothing to buy here today. I hope I can
find something worthwhile next time.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
I came here to buy antiques, but I ended up with
vegetables...

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
I couldn't find what I wanted, but I found
something else instead, so that's fine.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
I finally found the antique I've been looking for!
It's going to look great on display at home...

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
Pardon me. I'm haggling here.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
Whether you find something good or not in a
place like this really does depend on luck. The
trick is to keep on coming back.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
There's nothing here. What a waste of time.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
I hear there's a good antique shop around here,
but nothing else.

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
This might sound odd, but I find something
romantic about blueprints...

<NAME_MOB_FIFI>
I'm collecting valuable things from all over the
world.
<PAGE>
The antique shop in this town has a lot of rare
finds!
